com.esri.mo2.map.img
Class BaseServerImage

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.esri.mo2.map.img.BaseServerImage
All Implemented Interfaces:
Data, Image, MapData, ServerImage, Spatial
public class BaseServerImage
extends Object
implements ServerImage

A standard implementation of a ServerImage. It uses the Java Advanced Imaging API.

Constructor Detail

BaseServerImage

public BaseServerImage(SubLayerSnapshot snapshot,
                       Envelope envelope,
                       Dimension size)
Constructs an Image for subsequent loading, when both the Envelope and size are known in advance.

Parameters:
snapshot - a snapshot of subLayers currently within the ImageServerLayer
envelope - the world coordinates corresponding with the image dimensions
size - the image dimensions

draw

public void draw(Graphics2D g,
                 Symbol s,
                 int phase)
Description copied from interface: MapData
The MapData draws itself into the given graphics context during the given Layer DrawPhase. The method can choose to use the given Symbol or, a custom one.

MapData can choose to render themselves using any other means.

Specified by:
draw in interface MapData
Parameters:
g - the Graphics2D context
s - the Symbol
phase - the DrawPhase
See Also:
MapData.draw(java.awt.Graphics2D, com.esri.mo2.map.draw.Symbol, int)
